description:
Honoka attempts to murder Goro, who`s currently incapacitated due to the repeated use of his power. But after Koki and Lall hinder her, a frustrated Honoka encounters Chika while attempting to leave the hospital. Events then take a turn for the bizarre.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Close Your Eyes, Cover Your Ears, and Afterwards
Me o Tsubutte, Mimi o Fusaide, Sono Ato
目を瞑って, 耳を塞いで, そのあと
